Name: Salary
Description: Monthly salary or income from employment.

Name: Groceries
Description: Expenses for daily food and household items.

Name: Rent
Description: Monthly payment for housing or rent.

Name: Utilities
Description: Bills for electricity, water, gas, and internet.

Name: Transportation
Description: Daily transportation costs like fuel, public transport, or car maintenance.

Name: Dining Out
Description: Expenses on eating out at restaurants or cafes.

Name: Entertainment
Description: Leisure activities such as movies, events, and hobbies.

Name: Healthcare
Description: Medical expenses like doctor visits, medication, and insurance.

Name: Savings
Description: Money set aside for future use or emergencies.

Name: Subscriptions
Description: Recurring payments for services like streaming or gym memberships.
